title: If You Spot These “Gorgeous” Glass Pumpkins at HomeGoods, Grab 3
description: These decorative pieces will stand out in any home. READ MORE...
author: Ashia Aubourg
excerpt: These decorative pieces will stand out in any home.
text: Kitchen & HomeTableware & DecorProduct Reviews & RecommendationsWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Eric Glenn/ShutterstockWith Wicked finally hitting movie theaters this fall, not only am I excited to see Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande slay, but it’s also boosted my obsession with emerald green. In the past couple of weeks, we’ve seen food brands capitalizing on this trend that boasts the popular hue. From Walmart’s Wicked-themed microwaveable mac and cheese to Stanley’s new tumbler drop.There is a lot of hype around this movie, and recently, HomeGoods just filled its shelves with stunning emerald green pumpkins, ideal for getting in the Wicked spirit. The gorgeous pumpkins look as if they were professionally hand-blown. While their pricing isn’t available online, on average, you can find these types of items priced anywhere from $6.99 to $20, depending on the size and design.  Some of the pumpkins feature a stunning swirl of greens, while others, in terms of their structure, mimic their spirally gourd stem. They’ll stand out as a centerpiece on any table, or you can purchase a bunch of them and create a collection to fill a shelf. Shoppers can’t wait to get their hands on these stunning emerald-green pumpkins. People rushed to the comments of this post detailing the find to express their excitement. One person mentioned, “I need every glass pumpkin,” while another wrote about how they’re a “gorgeous green.” While these stunning pumpkins aren’t available online, you can order a similar one through T.J. Maxx’s website. They’re crafted with shimmery green glass and will charm any corner of your space.With the hype around Wicked continuing to grow, we anticipate emerald green being the color of the season, and I can’t wait to get my hands on a few of these glass gourds. We recommend heading to your nearest HomeGoods to get your hands on these stunning pumpkins as quickly as possible because they will likely sell out. Buy: 4pc Ceramic Pumpkins, $9.99
html:
• Kitchen & Home
  • Tableware & Decor
  • Product Reviews & Recommendations

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

With Wicked finally hitting movie theaters this fall, not only am I excited to see Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande slay, but it’s also boosted my obsession with emerald green. In the past couple of weeks, we’ve seen food brands capitalizing on this trend that boasts the popular hue. From Walmart’s Wicked-themed microwaveable mac and cheese to Stanley’s new tumbler drop.

There is a lot of hype around this movie, and recently, HomeGoods just filled its shelves with stunning emerald green pumpkins, ideal for getting in the Wicked spirit. 

The gorgeous pumpkins look as if they were professionally hand-blown. While their pricing isn’t available online, on average, you can find these types of items priced anywhere from $6.99 to $20, depending on the size and design.  

Some of the pumpkins feature a stunning swirl of greens, while others, in terms of their structure, mimic their spirally gourd stem. They’ll stand out as a centerpiece on any table, or you can purchase a bunch of them and create a collection to fill a shelf. 

Shoppers can’t wait to get their hands on these stunning emerald-green pumpkins. People rushed to the comments of this post detailing the find to express their excitement. One person mentioned, “I need every glass pumpkin,” while another wrote about how they’re a “gorgeous green.” 

While these stunning pumpkins aren’t available online, you can order a similar one through T.J. Maxx’s website. They’re crafted with shimmery green glass and will charm any corner of your space.

With the hype around Wicked continuing to grow, we anticipate emerald green being the color of the season, and I can’t wait to get my hands on a few of these glass gourds. We recommend heading to your nearest HomeGoods to get your hands on these stunning pumpkins as quickly as possible because they will likely sell out. 

Buy: 4pc Ceramic Pumpkins, $9.99
